description: The configuration for various mazes that spawn in the world.

propertyNames.description: Maze names can be any non-blank string of basic alphanumeric characters without spaces.

isMetal.description: True if this surface is metal, false otherwise. Metal surfaces make special sounds on impact.

junkTexs.description: The root gestalt ID for the near space junk textures that make up the maze.

junkDensity.description: The density of placement of near space junk.

farJunkTexs.descriptions: The root gestalt ID for the far space junk textures that make up the maze.

farJunkDensity.description: The density of placement of far space junk.

hull.description: Id of the hull of this ship.

money.description: Starting money for the player on spawn.

density.description: The density of these ships present on the planet. N/A for 'station'

items.description: Space separated list of items the ship possesses on spawn. See /docs/items.txt for a more detailed explanation.
